title: Alessandra Ambrosio flashes toned physique for game of beach volleyball in Santa Monica
text:
She stepped down as a Victoria's Secret Angel in 2017.

But that hasn't stopped Alessandra Ambrosio from maintaining a very fit and healthy lifestyle.

The 38-year-old was spotted on Saturday afternoon playing a round of beach volleyball with her boyfriend Nicolo Oddi, friends and kids.

Stunner: Alessandra Ambrosio flashed her incredibly toned frame on Saturday afternoon when she partook in a game of beach volleyball with her friends and family

Alessandra rocked a peach colored swimsuit underneath her beach ensemble for the friendly outing.

Her white T-shirt was an off-the-shoulder design with very low scoop sleeves to keep cool.

The model ensured all eyes were on her long and toned legs, completing her look with denim cut-off shorts.

Gorgeous: Alessandra rocked a peach colored swimsuit underneath her beach ensemble for the friendly outing

Comfort: Her white T-shirt was an off-the-shoulder design with very low scoop sleeves to keep cool

Trying to get the point: Alessandra appeared to be putting her body on the line while playing the game with friends

Alessandra styled her brunette hair into a slicked back high ponytail to ensure there were no distractions when she played the game.

The mom-of-two accessorised with a pair of shades and a necklace and appeared to be makeup free.

Earlier in the day, she was seen with her boyfriend, Nicolo Oddi in Los Angeles.

No distractions: Alessandra styled her brunette hair into a slicked back high ponytail to ensure there were no distractions when she played the game

Stylish: The mom-of-two accessorised with a pair of shades and a necklace and appeared to be makeup free

Ready to play: The model ensured all eyes were on her long and toned legs, completing her look with denim cut-off shorts

Going strong: Alessandra has been dating businessman Nicolo Oddi since July 2018

Alessandra and the Alanui founder were first linked in July 2018, when they were seen getting close at the HQ2 Nightclub in Atlantic City, New Jersey, according to Page Six.

'The two were very affectionate with each other, kissing and, when she wasn't dancing, they had their arms around each other,' a source told the site at the time.

Since then, the pair have been nearly inseparable and have been spotted at a number of events.

Alessandra was previously engaged to her baby daddy, Jamie Mazur, 38, for ten years.

They share kids Anja Louise, 11, and Noah Phoenix, seven.
